auditReport.analyzingDesc: This may take a few moments
auditReport.scoreBasedOn: Based on UX, CRO, SEO, trust, and marketing setup
auditReport.revenueWhatMeansDesc: These percentages show how much of your monthly revenue loss comes from each issue. We compared your store to similar successful stores in your industry to calculate these numbers. The higher the percentage, the more money you're losing from that specific problem.
auditReport.domainSubdomain: Your store is using a Shopify subdomain
auditReport.domainSubdomainDesc: Your store URL ({{url}}) is a Shopify subdomain (*.myshopify.com). This can hurt trust, SEO, and branding compared to a custom domain (e.g. www.yourbrand.com).
auditReport.domainSubdomainList1: Customers may perceive myshopify.com URLs as less professional or less trustworthy.
auditReport.domainSubdomainList2: Search engines and backlinks benefit more from a consistent branded domain.
auditReport.domainSubdomainList3: Email and ads look more credible when they point to your own domain.
auditReport.domainRecommendation: Connect a custom (branded) domain in Shopify: Settings → Domains. Add your domain, then point your DNS to Shopify. Once connected, set it as the primary domain so your store uses your branded URL instead of the .myshopify.com subdomain.
